revised_title: Investigation of Silver in Volcanic Ash and Continuity of Liquid and Gaseous States
tldr: The authors investigate the presence of silver in volcanic ash from the eruption of Cotopaxi and discover that it is present in trace amounts. Additionally, they discuss their ongoing research on the continuity of liquid and gaseous states of matter, specifically with ethyl ether, and propose a new formula to describe the relationship between pressure and temperature.
